abilities.name: Strange Behavior
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokémon to Slowbro as long as you don't Knock Out Slowbro. This power can't be used if Slowbro is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Psyshock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
